Package view

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    View
    View interface Holds ten methods to be override Implemented by MyVIew class The view generates new output to the user based on changes in the model.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BasicWindow
    BasicWindow class extends Observable and implements Runnable this class defines the main event loop and run the graphic user interface as long as the main shell is not disposed
    Character
    Character class defines an image with a specific position and draws it
    CLI
    Class CLI CLI- command line user interface uses to interact the program with the user.
    DialogWindow
    DialogWindow class extends Observable this is an abstract class for a dialog window
    GenerateMazeWindow
    GenerateMazeWindow class extends DialogWindow opens a generate maze window when the generate maze button is pushed
    MazeDisplay
    MazeDisplay class extends Canvas this is the game board widget that draws the game
    MazeWindow
    MazeWindow class extends basic window and implements view and java observer interface This is the general maze window which contains all the widgets
    MyView
    MyView class Implements the VIew interface The view generates new output to the user based on changes in the model.
    PropetiesWindow
    PropetiesWindow class extends DialogWindow opens a properties window when the properties button is pushed
